Card¶

class vox_cards.card.Card(card_data)¶

A class that represents cards. Should only be created through the deck class, however inheriting from this class to add additional functionality is encouraged.

Parameters

card_data (Dict) – A Dict with a suit and value.

Returns

A Card object.

Return type

Card

value: int

The integer representation of the cards value.

suit: Suit

A Suit enum denoting the cards suit.

text: str

The string representation of the cards value. (i.e. A, 1, 2, etc.).

full: str

The full name of the card (i.e. “Queen of Hearts”)
